name: Hard Drive
description: Hard drive is an electro-mechanical data storage device that stores and retrieves digital data using magnetic storage.

name: Ram
description: Ram is a form of computer memory that can be read and typically used to store working data and machine code.

name: Pen Drive
description: A USB flash drive is a data storage device that includes flash memory with an integrated USB interface.

name: Router
description: Router is a networking device that forwards data packets between computer networks.

name: Mouse
description: A computer mouse is a hand-held pointing device that detects two-dimensional motion relative to a surface.

name: Keyboard
description: Keyboard is a peripheral input device modeled after the typewriter keyboard which uses an arrangement of buttons.
